channel.title: Web Console on
channel.description: Recent content in Web Console on

item.title: Log In and Access Multi-cluster Projects
item.description:
This section describes how to log in to the KubeSphere web console and access multi-cluster projects.

Prerequisites

  • Application Management for Cluster Federation should have been installed and enabled.

  • You should get the username and password for a multi-cluster project member.

  • Contact the administrator to obtain the IP address and port number of the KubeSphere web console.

  • Depending on your network environment, you may need to configure firewall and traffic forwarding rules. For specific instructions, please contact your network administrator.
